metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14324 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The demo feature in Oracle GlassFish Open Source Edition 5.0 has TCP port7676 open by default with a password of admin for the admin account. Thisallows remote attackers to obtain potentially sensitive information,perform database operations, or manipulate the demo via a JMX RMI session,aka a "jmx_rmi remote monitoring and control problem." NOTE: this is not anOracle supported product.

criterions.comment: glassfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
